name: Planet SUR5
description:
Eat, drink, fight and survive on a foreign planet!

Rough prototype for the Untitled Game Jam #16!

--------------------------------

WASD - move
LMB - shoot
Escape - inventory

--------------------------------

Please pm me if you notice any bugs (there will be tons rn probably), I'll try to fix them with the next update. I'll add other operating systems later.

I got a little bit too ambitious with the project and ended up running out of time. Although right now it's in a pretty bad shape, I'll try to update it asap.
